title: Installation issue: gsl
body:
When building gsl there are a few problems.
1) gsl patch fails on 2.6
2) when using +external-cblas with nvhpc+blas:
==> Error: NoHeadersError: Unable to locate nvhpc headers in /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/include
removing CBLAS_CFLAGS= if '^nvhpc+blas' in self.spec:
one can go further:
3) when linking it fails to find aio_return and al function which are to be found with -lrt
$ spack install gsl@2.5+external-cblas %nvhpc ^nhpc+blas
==> Error: NoHeadersError: Unable to locate nvhpc headers in /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/include
This error occurs on Ubuntu18.04 wuth external nvhpc@21.2.

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-1079-af988fc32d
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
packages:
  nvhpc:
    externals:
    - spec: nvhpc@21.2+mpi+blas+lapack
      prefix: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk
      modules:
        - nvhpc/21.2
    - spec: nvhpc@21.2~mpi+blas+lapack
      prefix: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk
      modules:
        - nvhpc-nompi/21.2
compilers:
- compiler:
    spec: nvhpc@21.2
    paths:
      cc: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.2/compilers/bin/nvc
      cxx: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.2/compilers/bin/nvc++
      f77: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.2/compilers/bin/nvfortran
      fc: /opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/Linux_x86_64/21.2/compilers/bin/nvfortran
    flags: {}
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    target: x86_64
    modules: [nvhpc/21.2]
    environment:
      set:
        MODULEPATH: ${MODULEPATH}:/opt/nvidia/hpc_sdk/modulefiles
    extra_rpaths: []

### General information
